panels.description: Indicates whether determined dependencies are reachable. A value of 1 indicates healthy.
panels.title: Determined Healthy

targets.expr:
sum((kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}
  * on (pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) or vector(0) )/ sum(count by (gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_UTIL)) *100

panels.description: Shows average amount of GPU compute being used across the cluster. Average only includes non-zero utilization.
panels.title: Cluster GPU Utilization (current)

panels.description: Max number of unique users starting Determined workloads.
panels.title: Active Users

panels.description: Number of resource pools in use.
panels.title: Resource Pools

panels.description: Average GPU Utilization over time. A GPU can be under-utilized, i.e. it is using a small amount of the compute power available.
panels.title: Average GPU Utilization (over time)

panels.description: Number of pods with status "Running" by task type (trial, notebook, etc).
panels.title: Pods Running by Task Type (all)

panels.description: Number of pods with status "Running" by task type (trial, notebook, etc). Only includes pods with GPU Resources requested.

targets.expr:
sum by (label_determined_ai_task_type) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}
  * on (pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"} * on(pod) group_left(label_determined_ai_task_type) kube_pod_labels{label_determined_ai_task_type!=""})

panels.title: Pods Running by Task Type (GPU Requested)
Determined Pods Requesting GPU Resources by Resource Pool

targets.expr:
sum by (label_determined_ai_task_type, label_determined_ai_resource_pool) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}
  * on (pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending"} * on(pod) group_left(label_determined_ai_task_type, label_determined_ai_resource_pool) kube_pod_labels{label_determined_ai_task_type!=""})

panels.title: Pods Pending with GPU Requested by Task Type, Resource Pool

targets.expr:
sum by (label_determined_ai_task_type, label_determined_ai_resource_pool) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}
  * on (pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"} * on(pod) group_left(label_determined_ai_task_type, label_determined_ai_resource_pool) kube_pod_labels{label_determined_ai_task_type!=""})

panels.title: Pods Running with GPU Requested by Task Type, Resource Pool

targets.expr:
sum by (label_determined_ai_task_type, label_determined_ai_resource_pool) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}
  * on (pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed"} * on(pod) group_left(label_determined_ai_task_type, label_determined_ai_resource_pool) kube_pod_labels{label_determined_ai_task_type!=""})

panels.title: Pods Failed with GPU Requested by Task Type, Resource Pool
Determined Pods Requesting GPU Resources by Namespace

targets.expr:
sum by (label_determined_ai_task_type, namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}
  * on (pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending"} * on(pod) group_left(label_determined_ai_task_type) kube_pod_labels{label_determined_ai_task_type!=""})

panels.title: Pods Pending with GPU Requested by Task Type, Namespace

targets.expr:
sum by (label_determined_ai_task_type, namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}
  * on (pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"} * on(pod) group_left(label_determined_ai_task_type) kube_pod_labels{label_determined_ai_task_type!=""})

panels.title: Pods Running with GPU Requested by Task Type, Namespace

targets.expr:
sum by (label_determined_ai_task_type, namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}
  * on (pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed"} * on(pod) group_left(label_determined_ai_task_type) kube_pod_labels{label_determined_ai_task_type!=""})

panels.title: Pods Failed with GPU Requested by Task Type, Namespace

panels.description: Number of GPUs used by workspace over time.

targets.expr:
sum by (label_determined_ai_workspace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}
  * on (pod) group_left() kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"} * on(pod) group_left(label_determined_ai_workspace) kube_pod_labels{label_determined_ai_workspace!=""})

panels.title: GPUs Used by Workspace

panels.description: GPUs in use by model name.
panels.title: GPUs Used by GPU Model

panels.description: Average GPU Utilization (amount of individual GPU used) by workspace over time.

targets.expr: avg by (label_determined_ai_experiment_id, label_determined_ai_workspace)( DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_UTIL * on(pod) group_left(label_determined_ai_experiment_id, label_determined_ai_workspace) kube_pod_labels{label_determined_ai_experiment_id!=""} )

panels.title: GPU Utilization by Experiment ID

panels.description: Maximum GPU Memory Utilization by Determined Experiment ID over time, for trials only.

targets.expr: max by (modelName, label_determined_ai_experiment_id)( DCGM_FI_DEV_MEM_COPY_UTIL * on(pod) group_left(label_determined_ai_experiment_id, label_determined_ai_task_type) kube_pod_labels{label_determined_ai_task_type = "TRIAL"})

panels.title: GPU Memory Utilization by Experiment ID and GPU Model

targets.expr: sum by (label_determined_ai_task_type, label_determined_ai_user, label_determined_ai_experiment_id, label_determined_ai_workspace, namespace) (kube_pod_labels{label_determined_ai_task_type!=""})
